content:
I think there might be some confusion! Adidas Superstars are a type of casual sneaker, not hiking boots. They're great for everyday wear, but not suitable for hiking.

If you've recently gotten a new pair of Merrell boots, that's a great investment for hiking! Merrell is a well-known brand in the outdoor industry, and their boots are popular among hikers.

When you're trying on hiking socks, make sure to wear your Merrell boots to ensure a comfortable fit. You might also want to consider the terrain, weather, and length of your hike when choosing the right socks. If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask!
